summary: Modifies drinks from Milk for compatibility with Realistic Needs and Diseases.
descriptionHtml:
Modifies drinks from Milk for compatibility with Realistic Needs and Diseases. Requires the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17836]Be a Milk Drinker[/url] mod by CaptainRC AND [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26228]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/url] by perseid9.

Version 2.0 goes far beyond the original scope of this patch. Now included is the ability to use ANY of the various water types added by Realistic Needs and Diseases (with the exception of salty sea water) for both brewing the Milk Drinker beverages as well as for cooking various recipes like cheese and bread. Water with multiple servings will properly use just one serving for these recipes, so for example using a Waterskin with 3/3 servings to make a Canis Root Tea, you will end up with that same Waterskin at 2/3 servings.

Milk from vanilla Skyrim, RND, Hearthfire, and Milk Drinker will all have the same properties, and can also be used in all recipes calling for milk. All of the Milk Drinker beverages will properly reduce thirst. In addition, Canis Root Tea also serves as a hangover remedy!


[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]

Use ONLY ONE of the included .ESP files.

[list][*]Use [u]phiMilkRND-VanillaOnly[/u] if using Milk.esp and the base RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp.[/*]
[*]Use [u]phiMilkRND-VanillaHeathfire[/u] if using MilkHearthfire.esp, the base RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp, and RND_HearthFires-Patch.esp.[/*]
[*]Use [u]phiMilkRND-AllDLCUSKP[/u] if using MilkHearthfire.esp and the all-in-one RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp that includes the USKP patch.
[/*]
[/list]
IMPORTANT: The phiMilkRND-AllDLC+USKP.esp will NOT work with the base RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp and the individual patches. If you have only Hearthfire installed, use the base RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp and the RND_HearthFires-Patch.esp patch included in the main RND download along with phiMilkRND-Vanilla+Heathfire.esp. Otherwise, to use phiMilkRND-AllDLC+USKP.esp you MUST use the "RND merged esp 2" version of RND from the optional section [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/]on the Realistic Needs and Diseases page[/url].


[b]LOAD ORDER:[/b]

[list=1][*]Milk Drinker mod (either Milk.esp or MilkHearthfire.esp).[/*]
[*]Realistic Needs and Diseases and any patches.[/*]
[*]Phinix RND Milk mod.
[/*]
[/list]
author: Phinix
